title: Patch Notes
content: gain. Removed the turrets from the ground floor of Wyrm's Crossing since they weren't supposed to be there in the first place and never worked. Tweaked the position of the Neural Apparatus to improve navigation with controller near the elevator in the Mind Flayer Colony. Fixed a spot in the Emerald Grove beside Cal, Lia, and Rolan where moving the camera would occlude the world badly. Fixed the door to Isobel's room in Moonrise Towers appearing black. Fixed an unreachable fruit porridge in Wyrm'
